document_data.name: Voracalith
document_data.mainbody: A '''voracalith''' was a type of [[demon]] found within the [[Abyss]]. Voracaliths were famed for their gluttony, and were known to roam the Abyss devouring everything in their way. Voracaliths were simple minded, and were often lured in to fights by various [[demon lord]]s using fresh meat.
document_data.Abilities: Voracaliths were able to make use of tentacles in combat, and had a natural [[acid]] within their stomachs.
document_data.Combat: Voracaliths fought with the intention of pulling away enemies and devouring them. Voracaliths did not make use of any tactics.
